home.hero.title: Connecting Technology Students
home.hero.subtitle: BEST Las Palmas is part of an international network connecting engineering and technology students across Europe
home.about.title: What is BEST?
home.about.subtitle: Board of European Students of Technology
home.about.description: BEST is an international non-profit student organization connecting over 3,000 technology students from 83 European universities. We promote complementary education, cultural exchange, and cooperation among engineering students.
home.local.title: BEST Las Palmas
home.local.description: We are the local BEST group at Universidad de Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (ULPGC). We organize courses, workshops, engineering competitions, and cultural exchange events for technology students.
home.values.title: Our Values
home.values.education.desc: We complement academic training with practical courses and workshops
home.values.culture.desc: We connect students from different countries and cultures
home.values.cooperation.desc: We promote teamwork and international collaboration
home.sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
about.title: About Us
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.text: To promote academic excellence and personal development of technology students through complementary educational experiences, cultural exchange, and international cooperation.
about.vision.title: Our Vision
about.vision.text: To be the reference point for engineering and technology students in Las Palmas, connecting them with academic and professional growth opportunities at the European level.
about.board.title: Board of Directors
about.board.description: Meet the team that makes BEST Las Palmas possible
about.board.prd.quote: Crafting our story, sharing our vision
history.title: Our History
history.1: BEST Las Palmas is part of Board of European Students of Technology (BEST), an international non-profit student organization founded in 1989 that connects technology students from over 80 European universities.
history.2: Our local group at Universidad de Las Palmas de Gran Canaria works to offer students unique opportunities for personal and professional development, complementing their academic training with practical experiences and international connections.
history.3: Through BEST courses, technical workshops, engineering competitions, and cultural exchange events, we create an environment where students can grow, learn, and connect with professionals and peers from across Europe.

courses.upcoming.1.title: INSIDE AI: Where Data Becomes Smart
courses.upcoming.1.shortdescription:
The world is transforming, and data is at the heart of it. Every click, every image, every movement generates information that can help us understand and shape the future. But how do we turn this ocean of data into something meaningful? How do we teach machines to learn from it? 

 BEST Las Palmas invites you to an exciting journey into the world of Data and Artificial Intelligence, surrounded by sunshine, culture, and incredible people in the Canary Islands! Learn how data is collected, cleaned, and transformed to power intelligent systems. 

 No coding experience? No problem! This course is beginner-friendly, all tools and code will be provided, and you will focus on understanding concepts and applying them creatively. 

 Letâ€™s discover how raw data becomes smart insight, and how AI can shape our tomorrow!.
courses.upcoming.1.learn1: Understand how data becomes knowledge through the full AI pipeline.
courses.upcoming.1.learn2: Learn to collect, clean, and prepare data for intelligent systems.
courses.upcoming.1.learn3: Discover practical applications of data and AI in real-world scenarios.
courses.upcoming.1.learn4: Work in teams to apply what you learn to hands-on projects.
courses.upcoming.1.objective1: Meet and share with students from all over Europe in a multicultural and dynamic environment.
courses.upcoming.1.objective2: Discover Gran Canaria from a new perspective: nature, culture, and unforgettable experiences.
courses.upcoming.1.objective3: Enjoy a unique international experience that combines learning, friendship, and fun in an inspiring environment.
courses.past.1.title: Greensters, inc: EcO-Manual fOr Scarers
courses.past.1.description: The world is desperate. Climate change is worst year by year and emissions grow exponentially. Join this course and make it change
events.upcoming.1.title: Best Development
events.upcoming.1.description: Learn the best techniques for finding your first job from industry professionals.
events.upcoming.1.objective1: Inform students about the selection processes in the workplace.
events.upcoming.1.objective2: Raise awareness about the current demands of the labor market in non-technical skills.
events.upcoming.1.objective3: Facilitate communication between students and collaborating companies.
events.upcoming.1.objective4: Increase job placement opportunities through practical workshops and sessions with professionals from different sectors.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.1.quote: BEST events have helped me develop skills I wouldn't learn in class. Totally recommended!
testimonials.2.quote: I met students from all over Europe and learned from the best professionals in the industry.
testimonials.3.quote: BEST has been a transformative experience. I've grown both personally and professionally.
